heading.intro: Add a new program to start a blank report or copy an existing report. Copying a programâ€™s NAAAR will retain the structure of your program, including plans and network adequacy standards, but allow you to enter updated responses for the new reporting period, saving you time. You can still edit these details within.

props.label: If you want to copy an existing report, select one (optional)
Reporting period start date
props.hint:
For items below, indicate the reporting period for the analysis and compliance information entered into this report. CMS expects states to enter a reporting period end date that is no more than one year prior to the submission of this report.

If submitting because of a new contract or significant change in plan operations, the reporting period may cover less than one year.

If submitting an annual report, the reporting period should cover one year.

Enter start date of the reporting period represented in the report.

props.label: Reporting period end date
props.hint: Enter end date of the reporting period represented in the report.

props.label: Plan type included in program
props.hint: Indicate the managed care plan type (MCO, PIHP, PAHP, or Other, specify) that contracts with the state in each program.
